game.name: Chilling Silence
game.shortDescription: Immerse yourself in the gloomy atmosphere of a small northern town at the turn of the millennium, where reality intertwines with the inner demons of the main character, who suffers from a strange form of social phobia. What could have happened in this godforsaken place at the edge of the earth?
